message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than it is to me. I'm willing to part with it for $1,150,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I agree this product would be valuable to my business, but the price needs to work on my end as well.  How about we settle around $900,000?
Bob, I appreciate your understanding of the value this product brings. While $900,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,075,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  To be frank, I have a budget I need to stay within, and  $1,000,000 is the most I can offer for the product.
